data.caption: Book Closure for Dividend & AGM
data.news_body: Andhra Sugars Ltd has informed BSE that the Register of Members & Share Transfer Books of the Company will remain closed from September 18, 2024 to September 21, 2024 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of Payment of Dividend & 77th Annual General Meeting (AGM) of the Company to be held on September 21, 2024.

data.caption: Clarification sought from Andhra Sugars Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Andhra Sugars Ltd on January 21, 2022, with reference to Movement in Volume.

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Allotment of Equity Shares
data.news_body: Andhra Sugars Ltd has informed BSE regarding Allotment of Equity Shares of Face Value of Rs. 2/- each on Sub-division.

data.caption: Clarification
data.news_body: With reference to significant movement in price, in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded, Andhra Sugars Ltd has submitted to BSE a copy of Clarification is enclosed.

data.caption: Clarification
data.news_body:
With reference to significant movement in price, in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded, Andhra Sugars Ltd has Clarified to BSE that With reference to your email dated 03.04.2020 with regard to information/ announcement which may have a bearing on Price/ Volume behaviour in the script.

In this connection we would like to inform you that there is no such information/ announcement with us.

data.caption: Clarification sought from Andhra Sugars Ltd
